content: Create a design document describing the markdown format changes
Update test for writeInternal JSON with backticks
Update buffer.go writeInternal to write JSON with backticks (keep 'json:' prefix)
Update decode.go parseInternalSection to parse JSON from backticks (support both old and new format)
Update test for writeHTTPReq headers/body with backticks
Update buffer.go writeMetadata to write metadata lines with backticks
Update decode.go parseMetadataSection to parse from backticks
Update buffer.go writeSignature to write signature lines with backticks
Update decode.go parseSignatureSection to parse from backticks
Update buffer.go writeHTTPReq to write headers and body with separate backticks
Update decode.go parseHTTPRequestSection to parse headers/body from backticks
Update buffer.go writeHTTPRes to write headers and body with separate backticks
Update decode.go parseHTTPResponseSection to parse headers/body from backticks
Implementation completed - all sections now use backticks for better markdown rendering
